channel.title: payment on Taiga Resources
channel.description: Recent content in payment on Taiga Resources

item.title: Is it possible to cancel my subscription whenever I want?
item.description: Yes, you can cancel at any time. Plans are paid monthly or yearly, so if you cancel, once you do so, the plan will run to the end of the period and not renew.

item.title: Who has to pay to use taiga.io?
item.description: Taiga is an Open Source platform. At the same time, we provide a freemium cloud/SaaS offer so you can use our own infrastructure to host all your projects and teams.

item.title: Why is my project blocked on taiga.io?
item.description: We are sorry to hear that. The reason any project would be blocked is because the owner of that project did not subscribe in time to an appropriate paid plan.
